mdRecord.dcterms:description: "located on the campus of Oberlin College, is one of the most advanced examples of Green building in the United States. Construction crews completed work on the building in January 2000. The following semester, classes in conservation biology, environment and society, sustainable agriculture, ecological design, environmental education, physical geology, and solar energy were held in the center." -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adam_Joseph_Lewis_Center_for_Environmental_Studies [work]
